Priscilla Schwartz bụ onye ọka iwu Sierra Leone, nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka Attorney General na Minista nke Ikpe Ziri Ezi (2018[]) na Sierra Leone.

A mụrụ Schwartz Priscilla Fofana. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fourah Bay College na Bachelor of Arts na Bachelor of Laws. O nwetara Master of Laws na Kings College, Mahadum London na dọkịta ya na Queen Mary, Mahadụ London.

Na 11 Junn, na afọ 2018 Schwartz ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Sierra Leone ka a họpụta ya dị ka Attorney General na Minister of Justice. Onye isi ala Julius Maada Bio họpụtara ya iji dochie Charles Margai.

Site na afo 1996 ruo n'afọ 2006, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ steeti na onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nye onye ọka iwu ukwu na Minista Ikpe na Sierra Leone. Ọ na-enye ndụmọdụ maka ike, nkwukọrịta yana mmanụ ala na mineral mining. Schwartz rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịhazi Ụlọikpe Pụrụ Iche nke UN maka Sierra Leone na nleta Kọmitii Nchebe.

Schwartz bụ prọfesọ iwu na Mahadum Leicester site na afo 2007 na afọ 2012. Site na n'afọ 2008 ruo n'afọ 2011, ọ bụ onye nkuzi dị elu na alma mater ya Queen Mary, Mahadum London. Ọ kụzikwaara na School of Oriental and African Studies, Mahadum London site na afọ 2011 ruo n'afọ 2013. Tupu nhọpụta ya dị ka Attorney-General na Minister of Justice, ọ bụ onye nkuzi dị elu na onye nduzi nke Energy and Natural Resources Law Programme, na College of Professional Services, Royal Docks School of Business and Law, University of East London, United Kingdom site na afọ 2012 ruo n'afọ 2018.
A na-ebipụta nnyocha Schwartz n'ọtụtụ ebe na iwu azụmaahịa mba ụwa na akwụkwọ akụkọ mmepe akụ na ụba.

A kpọrọ Schwartz n'ụlọ mmanya dị na Sierra Leone.  Ọ bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ọka iwu n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Sierra Leone Ọkachamara ya bụ iwu ike, iwu akụ na ụba, iwu itinye ego mba ụwa, iwu ego mba ụwa
Iwu azụmahịa mba ụwa, ọchịchị ụlọ ọrụ, ọrụ ọha na eze na iwu gburugburu ebe obibi. Ọ na-adụ gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa na-arụ ọrụ na mba ndị na-emepe ọdụ.
